alert.note: Alert for Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 5:23PM EDT until May 13 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Lee County in southwestern Florida... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 523 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lochmoor Waterway Estates, or near Cape Coral, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Whiskey Creek, North Fort Myers, Page Field Airport, McGregor, East Dunbar, Suncoast Estates, Pine Manor and Matlacha. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
